title: 96/590/EC: Commission Decision of 2 October 1996 amending Decisions 93/24/EEC and 93/244/EEC and concerning additional guarantees relating to Aujeszky's disease for pigs destined to regions free of the disease in Austria (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 2 October 1996 amending Decisions 93/24/EEC and 93/244/EEC and concerning additional guarantees relating to Aujeszky's disease for pigs destined to regions free of the disease in Austria (Text with EEA relevance) (96/590/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. In Annex I to Decision 93/244/EEC:
'Austria: all regions` is replaced by 'Austria: lower Austria, north of the Danube`.
2. The following is added to Annex I to Decision 93/24/EEC:
'Austria: Vienna, upper Austria, Salzburg, Tyrol, Vorarlberg, Styria, Carinthia, Burgenland and lower Austria, south of the Danube`.
This Decision shall apply from 15 October 1996.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 October 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 1977/64.
(2) OJ No L 243, 11. 10. 1995, p. 16.
(3) OJ No L 111, 5. 5. 1993, p. 21.
(4) OJ No L 60, 9. 3. 1996, p. 29.
(5) OJ No L 16, 25. 1. 1993, p. 18.
